derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from late Middle English affodill, from medieval Latin affodilus, variant of Latin asphodilus (see asphodel). The initial d- is unexplained

entry.def: A daffodil is a yellow spring flower with a central part shaped like a tube and a long stem.

means.word_mean: 1. any of numerous varieties of Narcissus plants having showy often yellow flowers with a trumpet-shaped central crown
